item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:12, topic:154904”]That’s 10 squares, I guess. But, I’ve never messed with attackPlayersWithin, just had to look it up.

Try making it so if wildy == false, they don’t get killed, such as applyDead = false;[/quote]

how? code set up? im new to it >.<

item.title: Ancient Staff error
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

That’s 10 squares, I guess. But, I’ve never messed with attackPlayersWithin, just had to look it up.

Try making it so if wildy == false, they don’t get killed, such as applyDead = false;

public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(539, 30, 10); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }
